description.value:
By changing their diet, bantrids can cause their foot-orb to gain hollow, honeycomb-like cells throughout its structure. These bantrids are faster and float more easily in water, but the extra speed comes with a loss of fine control. These bantrids’ land speed increases to 50 feet, and they gain a +2 species bonus to @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.iLlBAZBfHJMZQRQx]{Athletics} checks to swim.

This replaces balanced, daredevil, and swift.

modifiers.name: Hollow Orb
modifiers.notes: By changing their diet, bantrids can cause their foot-orb to gain hollow, honeycomb-like cells throughout its structure. These bantrids are faster and float more easily in water, but the extra speed comes with a loss of fine control. These bantrids’ land speed increases to 50 feet, and they gain a +2 species bonus to  Athletics checks to swim.
